text: Ezio Cardi (born 24 October 1948) is a retired Italian track cyclist. As an amateur he competed in the sprint and 1000 m time trial events at the 1972 Summer Olympics, placing ninth in the time trial. In 1973 he turned professional and won a bronze medal in the sprint at the 1973 UCI Track Cycling World Championships.Ezio Cardi. cyclingarchives.com ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Veneto
